features.name: Home Screen
features.description: Main dashboard showing overview of tasks, notes, and schedules with quick actions

features.name: Tasks Management
features.description: Task list view with ability to add, edit, view, and complete tasks with categories and priorities

features.name: Notes Management
features.description: Notes list with ability to add, edit, and delete notes with category organization

features.name: Calendar/Schedule
features.description: Calendar view showing scheduled events with ability to add and manage schedules

features.name: Settings
features.description: App settings including theme, language, notifications, and data export options

features.name: Category Service
features.description: Category management for organizing tasks, notes, and schedules

features.name: Notification Service
features.description: Push notification scheduling and management for reminders

features.name: Export Service
features.description: Data export functionality for backing up and sharing data

features.name: Database Layer
features.description: SQLite database initialization and connection using expo-sqlite

features.name: State Management
features.description: Global state management using Zustand store

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components including TaskCard, NoteCard, EmptyState, and LoadingSpinner
